name: Duo Consulting
tagline: Content Leads Clients - HubSpot & Drupal Platforms
description:
Duo is a web design agency that expertly and efficiently creates custom solutions for our clients.  We’re a handpicked team of experts selected to design, develop and partner with your organization to reach your digital goals.  We're dedicated to changing the way organizations market and communicate online.
We create cutting-edge design and digital marketing platforms that drive measurable results on the Drupal open-source CMS and HubSpot platforms.
We believe in elevating the user experience, the tenants of inbound marketing, and the value of content.
We create sites that engage users, encourage collaboration, and improve organizational knowledge.
We are committed to growing as individuals and as an organization to push our client’s beyond their original goals and aspirations.
We know the best practices and we expertly choose what will (and won’t) work for our clients. Our commitment to education keeps us up to date on the latest and greatest technological advancements.
Duo has been developing websites since 1999. Our development team has an average of 12 years of experience. We have survived Y2K, the dot-com bubble, the web 2.0 epidemic, and are currently navigating the waters of multi-channel design.
Services include:
Drupal Development
User Experience Design
Inbound Marketing
Application Integration
Mobile/Responsive
Service Agreements
